name: Vitamin C Glycolic Brightening Serum
about: What it is:A potent serum with vitamin C and glycolic acid to visibly improve hyperpigmentation and uneven tone for dramatically brighter-looking skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dark Spots, Dullness, and Uneven Texture.Formulation:Serum.Highlighted Ingredients:- Proprietary Vita-C (Vitamin C) Complex: Ensures stability and potency for brighter-looking skin..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, phthalates, mineral oil, oxybenzone, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Formulated with three vitamin C technologies for enhanced stability and potency, this serum optimizes the penetration of vitamin C with resurfacing glycolic acid for the brightest-looking results. The serum is encased in a dual-chamber bottle to deliver a fresh dose with every use..Clinical Results:In a clinical test, results included:
ingredients: -Proprietary Vita-C (Vitamin C) Complex: Ensures stability and potency for brighter-looking skin..-Glycolic Acid: Removes dulling surface cells and helps vitamin C penetrate more effectively. .-Phyto-Luminescent Extract: Transforms UV energy into a light source that visibly illuminates the skin. ..Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycolic Acid, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimethicone, Sodium Hydroxide, HDI/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Diisopropyl Sebacate, C13-16 Isoparaffin, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Ascorbic Acid, Urea, Yeast Amino Acids, Trehalose, Inositol, Taurine, Betaine, Glutathione, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Cetearyl Isononanoate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Oleyl Alcohol, Silica, Hexylresorcinol, Polysilicone-11, Triheptanoin, Polyisobutene, Marrubium Vulgare Meristem Cell Culture, Zanthoxylum Bungeanum Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Verbascum Thapsus Flower, Butylene Glycol, Mica, Hexylene Glycol, Sodium Surfactin, Xymenynic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, PEG-7 Trimethylolpropane Coconut Ether, Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract, Sorbitol, Tin Oxide, Xanthan Gum, T-Butyl Alcohol, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Decyl Glucoside, Gold, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Cleanse with Essential-C Cleanser (sold separately) and pat skin dry..-Gently pat Vitamin C Dark Circle Correcting Eye Serum (sold separately) around your eye area, avoiding direct contact with eyes..-Massage Vitamin C Glycolic Brightening Serum over your face, neck, and chest, following with a moisturizer. .-Use a Murad sunscreen (sold separately) during the day..-Vitamin C Glycolic Brightening Serum may produce a slight tingling sensation, which is temporary and normal.

reviews.review_title: Best Vitamin C I have Tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after watching Alex, a cosmetic chemist on Tiktok talk about her favorite vitamin c products and this is one of them.  She explained this product has Glutathione which was a superstar ingredient in vitamin c and I have to agree.  This vitamin c has does wonders for my skin, I use tretinoin so there aren't very many products that I try that show a noticeable improvement in my already really good skin but this is one of them.  My skin has such a brightness and glow about it, it has also improved my texture.  It's the dead of winter and freezing here in Canada but this has made my skin look so glowy and bright. I do not have issues with pilling at all as some of the other reviews mention but I use only one pump and always let me products sink in before makeup. The down side is the price, it's very expensive but for me with the results I've seen, it's worth it.  I have been using for just over a month and have about half left.  LOVE THIS!!!

reviews.review_title: A must-have if you have hyperpigmentation

reviews.review_text: It’s the best Vitamin C serum that I’ve purchased so far. You can see the difference even after using it for once. Highly recommend! But don’t use too much of it tho since it can irritate your skin. (Only 1 or 2 drops is enough for your entire face and neck)

I've never found a Vitamin C product that my skin can tolerate before. This is a major win for me.

reviews.review_title: Best Vitamin C Serum .. but worst packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried SO MANY (if not all) vitamin C serums and this is the very BEST vitamin C serum for me.  It cleared up my terrible 30s acne and gives the best glow.  BUT, with that said, the packaging sucks - I have had to return several bottles bc the two components wont come out at the same time, taking away a lot of the benefit.

i have tried many different vitamin c serum, i was hesitant to try this because of the price, but I decided to give this a try, and omg it has faded my sun spot on my left cheek, i was so surprised, wish i took pics of before and after. I'm gonna keep buying this from now on, and a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was able to snatch this for 30% off during a Sephora sale. Brightens my skin. No irritation. I have to shake well before using or else the product comes out very separated and a lot of oil leaks out, not sure if this is normal. After shaking, the product comes out fine. But because I need to shake it, I noticed a leakage in the back… so 2 stars off for that because for this price point I don’t want to waste any product due to the packaging. Pictured is 1 pump - I apply generously to my face and neck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Always receive compliments about my “glowing and bright” skin when I use this product (compared to Caudalie’s radiance serum that I rotate with). A little bit goes a long way and I do use it at night only to let the stuff work its magic while I sleep. I protect my skin with sunblock during the day since this will make you sensitive to ultraviolet rays. It does not really get rid of dark spots from aging but it does provide a healthier shine for your skin. I enjoy using it when I want a break from retinol and my bleaching cream. I have normal-dry skin and minimal breakouts and my skin can tolerate mild burning before adjusting from initial use. This can be too strong for people with super sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: perfect product, imperfect price and packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best vit C product I’ve used. It’s effective, and doesn’t have a strong odor. One small pump is all you need, and be sure to rub it in so any layers going over it don’t pill. I use this after my shower in the AM (no face wash) and then either add a light moisturizer or go right to SPF. I’ve tried other vit C creams and nothing compares. One star off for the price and excess packaging which makes it more difficult to travel with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got the mini size of this to try, and I actually love it! Its gentle enough to use daily, but strong enough that I actually notice a difference. I have pale skin, so any blemishes typically leave a red mark, and I have found this really evens out my skin tone and fades marks. Will be purchasing the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fair skin and am very pale so I've always scared from acne really badly. Also have dark under eyes. After about a week of using this every day in the morning I've noticed a much more even texture and old and new acne scars look much better. My skin also just has a nicer glow to to it. I also love the creamy light texture of this product. It goes on nicely, feels great on the skin and I don't need to use a lot of it. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used 4 times in 3 days seen results already, no more dull face I never write reviews or anything but this was quick and I saw it fast face looks more even!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always had decent skin, but as I reach 30 wanted to get intentional about finding a good skincare regimen.   I use the murad retional youth system, which I love. But recently I added this and I can say it is what I was missing. My skin’s texture is nearly perfect and I don’t even wear face makeup anymore (except for a big event).   Also, I didn’t notice the smell so many people commented on. I recommend for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

So gentle on my sensitive skin. I’m a Murad customer for life now . First product to not make me break out I couldn’t believe it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: TBH I was looking for the PTR version in store during the sale and was sold this instead by a Murad employee (didn’t know that until checkout so was a little annoyed). Yes it ended up being slightly less expensive than what I was planning to spend and allegedly is higher % vitamin C but I wouldn’t buy this again. I haven’t noticed ANY smell that the other reviews mention. I’ve only used for a week and I won’t comment on any differences in skin at this time. BUT it’s so stingy/itchy for a while after application. Putting makeup on top makes it worse and I use a different product at night so I’m debating only using on no-makeup days. The tube I can tell will be annoying to break open to rescue the last of this product but I’ll do it cause it wasn’t cheap! I have dry rosy skin and live in a dry northern climate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum works! Within one week of use, I noticed a significant change in my skin. However, if you want to invest in this product, I'd suggest you purchase the standard size because the mini size runs out pretty quickly. It didn't last more than a week for me.
This stuff is amazing. It really makes a difference in one bottle. My skin is clearer and spots are reduced. I have tried other Vit C serums and this is by far my favorite.

reviews.review_title: FINALLY HAVE FOUND THE THING I WAS MISSING!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I never take time to write reviews although I use them to base my decision off whether I should buy something or not. I did tons of research about some brightening serums, and I'm so glad I went with this one. There are tons out there that are pricier and don't work as well. I bought this to help my dark spots, but it also helped even out my skin tone and I didn't even know that it was THAT uneven until trying this stuff. Not only has it helped me in both of these areas, but my breakouts have significantly decreased especially around that time of month. I know everyone's skin is different, but you need to RUN (not walk) to get this serum, sis. It has seriously transformed my skin and I'm still on my first bottle. I will be a lifetime customer for this environmental shield!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect pick me up to revitalize my skin! No more dull or drab.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rotate between this and the Sunday Riley Vit C. I notice whenever I go back to Murad, my skin is instantaneously brighter - it starts glowing within days. I have unproblematic skin and have a decent routine that includes retinol (2-3x/week) and a chemical exfoliant (1-2x/week). I will continue re-purchasing this product. 30ml usually lasts about three months, just one pump is enough for my face every morning.

reviews.review_text: I have some dark spots that appear on my face like bloshes never had it before so I wanted it to disappear and I have used it for a month now you think it would be getting lighter but hasn't

reviews.review_text: I noticed a difference within days! My skin is the brightest and healthiest it’s ever been. I get it, always drink your water but, great skincare products deserve their credit. I only wear this when my skin really needs it though as it does have acids that may irritate if used too often. I had pretty bad hormonal acne scars and it’s lightened them to almost disappear. I don’t ever wanna run out as it’s pretty hefty in price but SO WORTH IT. You might feel it sting at times but to me it’s an indication that my face needs it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff works OK but it smells SO BAD. I have to breathe through my mouth while using it and for a minute after I’ve applied it. I’d return it but I opened it after the return window closed. Now I feel stuck with it.

I had to literally hold my breathe to apply it and quickly put sunscreen on afterwards to mellow out the smell. I’m not typically picky about fragrance or odors but this smelled terrible to me. I couldn’t handle it.

It went away three days after I stopped using it. I did like the texture of the serum though. I’ve never had a reaction like that before too a product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for over a year and love it, but have to lower the rating based on packaging and price. I love the effects of this product, but once you get to the bottom 10-15% of the container, the product doesn’t come out evenly and is more greasy than a nice texture. This is a higher priced product, and I can’t justify continuing to buy it when so much goes to waste each time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this serum. Normally ascorbic acid is a bit harsh in my skin and i have been using derivatives like ptr. I decided to give this one a try and i love it. I have normal to dry skin but find i am able to tolerate this well. It plays nice under makeup as well. Im a but curious if i will have any issues with it in the winter when my skin is more dry but so far ive had no problems in the ~6 weeks ive used it. My skin is definitely smoother (likely from the glycolic acid) which is great! Ive not been using it long enough to fade any hyperpigmentation with any notable results but i have noticed a slight reduction in one particular spot that is likely attributable to this product. I highly recommend if you are someone slightly sensitive to other ascorbic acid products...this one just might work for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have really bad acne scarring and when I first started using this product I had noticed a change right away. It brightened everything up and truly cleared my skin. I have never been one to get compliments on my skin and since I have been using this product I have been getting a lot of compliments. This is definitely going to be lifer product for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells like old orange peels if that’s what you’re looking for.  I realize anything that has Vitamin C is going to smell citrusy but this isn’t good.  I have yet to see any benefits from the serum itself.  It also says to cover areas where AHAs have been applied from the sun but it doesn’t say how long of time between....and why?  I might have to do more research, I’m glad I only got the trial size.

reviews.review_title: It Just Works Like It Says It Will
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

I just wear some sunscreen during the day and my face has completely changed for the better. You don’t have to use it everyday so it lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This did nothing for my skin. It pills under moisturizer. It's also really expensive for the effect, which is nothing  special. It didn't clear my dark spots. I will not repurchase this. I threw it away.

reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a few days now and I love this. My skin has been glowing and feeling hydrated. It has a good smell to it as well. I haven't had a bad reaction to it.  My skin also feels less dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry sensitive skin so this was irritating. But I was trying to lighten some sun spots & it did help. I used on my neck because I had a big sun spot & it helped make go away. I don’t use it on my face tho.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve had this product and been using it over three months. I can say I hardly saw results in my skin care routine. Didn’t do much for my face. Didn’t brighten up or correct my dark spots. Didn’t firm my skin or plump it. Only thing I could say it did was that it help a bit with my dry patches but that’s all. Overall it’s meh I wouldn’t waist your money on such an expensive serum.

reviews.review_title: Okay product, but packaging is non-recyclable. :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Okay product, however the packaging is an environmental disaster. Admittedly beautiful, the bottle consists of clear hard  plastic on the outside with two small orange plastic containers on the inside, each containing different parts of the serum that are mixed when pumped out. Recyclable? Hardly.  In addition, you cannot effectively dispense all of the product, due to the design. There will always be about 10% of the product left at the bottom of the inner orange containers no matter how many times you pump the dispenser, turn it upside down, or even try to dismantle it (which I did) - the packaging is made of such hard plastic, you can't cut it or otherwise access a fairly substantial amount that you can see, but will always be left on the bottom.  The product itself is good, but not great. You will feel a tingling sensation when you use it, suggesting that it works. Unless your face is properly cleansed and toned, be careful, as you may experience breakouts with it. I have switched to using Skinceuticals c e ferulic, which I'm much happier with.  I implore the manufacturer to rethink their packaging. If every company made products like this, the environmental repercussions would be dire.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: High strength vitamin c treatment! I love how strong it is with the glycolic acid but it irritated my skin after a few weeks of daily use. I'm planning on using is maybe 2ish times a week now but this is super effective for brightening and smoothing the skin. Make sure you wear sunscreen with this though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was recommended by the salesperson at Sephora. She said it was the best for sensitive skin. When I used it in the morning with my moisturizer it was sticky. I waited to put my makeup on and when I did it started to separate and peel. When I tried to buff it out with my makeup brush it started to become little gummy balls. I didn’t have time to start my makeup so I tried putting my setting powder on and it was so blotchy. This was just my experience but for the money maybe it will help somebody make their choice before buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use Drunk Elephant Vitamin C Serum but I was told that the Murad Glycolic Serum was better and decided to give it a try. I tried it for the first two weeks and really liked it and thought it made my skin brighten. By the end of the month, I was breaking out so much to a point where it was painful. I never had acne prone skin, nor do I ever experience breakouts but this was bad. I didn't change my routine both day and night and this product was the only item I changed. I also use the Murad AHA/BHA exfoliating cleanser every 3 days and I am so happy with the results so far. As a bonus my skin looks so bright and hydrated. It is worth every penny!

reviews.review_text: Just as it says in the description, I definitely felt tingling when I first put this on, especially if my skin was feeling drier than normal. I normally have to wear full coverage foundation to feel confident at work, but I’ve been using a CC cream now and am so glad because I truly believe this product helped! I received this product to review for free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for an honest review. I have been using this product for around 6 weeks and have seen a dramatic difference in my skin's luminosity and overall skin tone. In addition, my skin type is on the dryer side and have seen a change in my skin's texture. The product is very light weight and absorbs quickly. I am very happy with my skin's results from the product and highly recommend anyone interested in trying it.

reviews.review_title: Watch this magic serum brighten up your day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free in exchange for my feedback on them. I will be honest in what I say and I am not exaggerating when I say that this product does absolute wonders for your skin. You will notice your skin glowing and radiating in just a couple of uses and the best part is you don't need too much of the product. The serum has Vitamin C which is a major factor in ensuring these results and having used various other products in the past, I have to say that this product definitely blew me away with the results so far having used it for a few days. I continue to use it everyday and can hopefully write up a follow up review after a couple of weeks as well. The smoothness and oily texture takes away dark spots and also keeps my skin supple. I highly recommend it and will definitely be on the lookout to buy this once it is done if the results stay the same. I know a few people on this site may have spoken about the odd scent, but I personally had no issue with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is quickly becoming a skincare product I'll never go without. It's amazing! I've been using it for a week and my skin is seriously glowing. I put on some light makeup today and I couldn't believe how amazing everything looked. My skin has been going through something rough for the past three years since I had a baby - texture, uneven skin tone, dull spots - and nothing has worked. This is the first time I've felt like I have a beautiful blank canvas to do my makeup on and it actually looks like it's filtered (it's not!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

I love it and recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved using this product! It really helped with my skin's dullness.

reviews.review_title: My skin is more radiant now

reviews.review_text: I'd received this product for free to try on in exchange for an honest review, I've use it for about 6 weeks now, i just recently had a baby (she's 2m now) and my skin changed completely through my pregnancy, i got some darker marks and had some really dry patches and some areas became really oily, using the serum in my morning and night routine i can see a lot of difference, the darker spots are almost gone, no more dry skin and is less oily overall, it feels really smooth when i apply it wicth i love that

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

I’m not sure if its the Glycolic acid in it and I don’t like the feeling of a little tingly burn when applying a ‘vitamin c serum’ onto my skin. I also don’t noticed any improvement in the texture and quality of the skin but I do love the two chamber design and when you pump out the product, it delivers just the right amount. I feel like it, it didn’t work for my skin type and personal preferences but definitely will work for other.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this product! It works wonder for you!!! I would highly recommend this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loving Murad’s Vita-C line! I’ve been using this along with the lightening serum and the dark circle corrector, and I’ve definitely noticed an evening out of my skin tone. As with other vitamin C products, there was definitely a purging phase where my skin was not so great, but it didn’t last more than a week or two. If you’re patient and stick with it, you’ll definitely notice a difference! The smell of this product was a little odd (somewhere between chemicals and rosemary?) but I didn’t feel like it stuck around after application, so it didn’t bother me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using multiple (3) Murad Environmental Shield products all together, so it's tough to say which one is most responsible for the improvement in my skin tone and just the general new glow of my skin, but I really like the combination!  I love the 2-chamber design of this serum, but more importantly, it feels great on my skin and doesn't irritate my skin like some other glycolic acid products do (I have super sensitive skin).  The only reason I am dinging it a star is because I'm confused about hydroquinone, an ingredient used to lighten skin tones and touted as a highlighted ingredient in one of the other Murad products that I'm using, but falls in the [negative] ingredient callouts shown in this listing - that has me a bit concerned.  That aside, I'd definitely recommend this product for its benefits overall, especially as a glycolic serum for those with easily irritated skin, like me.

reviews.review_title: Works! Quality ingredients. Not drastic - perfect!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product complementary in exchange for an honest review. I am a little late submitting it - but I did want to give it a full 6 weeks of testing in order to give a fair and honest review. And I truly loved this product. After my last (3rd) pregnancy, my skin was absolutely ruined. Totally different than it’s always been. I have freckles all over, which I’m not a fan of anyway, but aside from them my skin just seemed darker and begging for moisture. I loved the way this product felt on the skin, so nice and smooth. Also it’s not a drastic difference- which I LOVE bc I wasn’t looking for a drastic difference. To be quite honest I was nervous to try it Incase it were. I noticed small differences early; so results didn’t take long to see- just not huge altering changes. My skin has since looked much brighter (and I typically don’t wear makeup daily) and I’m a step closer to getting my pre-pregnancy skin back! I’m excited to continue using this product!!

reviews.review_text: This is a miracle in a bottle. I’ve tanned throughout my teen years until just recently.  I am approaching 30 and decided to start taking skin care seriously. My dark spots have diminished, the look and size of my pores have shrinked and my skin is no longer an oil pit. The serum doesn’t leave a sticky or oily feel after I’ve applied it. Just a hydrated feel If that makes sense. It absorbs very quickly, so quickly actually ice do sections at a time. It’s worth every penny.

So far I am leaning toward buying this product again and have already recommended it to others because the consistency and the way my face feels so fresh is like no other.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to review. I haven’t seen a major difference in my skin using this product, but it hasn’t made things worse, so I’ll continue to use it. My only complaint is the packaging. The pump tends to get messy, because the product doesn’t come out with much force.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I did receive this complementary for testing and reviewing purposes. Murad is one of my all time favorite skincare lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product to review it. I used it for 30 days to make sure that I could give an accurate review. I really saw a difference on my cherms where I had old acne scars. This product helped lighten the scars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a tester from bzzagnt and I really enjoyed it! It was very brightening and your skin will really absorb it. I will be repurchasing once I run out of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for a review. I am really loving this product. Murad makes some of the nicest products. I’ve really noticed the difference in my skin, it is much brighter and smoother. I have very sensitive skin and this serum is nice and light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first product I have tried from Murad. I received this as a sample to test but my review is honest. I think skincare takes some time before you notice a difference. I really like the packaging. It sinks into the skin very quickly and I hope to see results with further use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for my honest review. This serum is amazing. It dries Up so quickly and doesn’t leave a greasy feel. I feel the difference in my skin after using it for 2 weeks! The only problem with me was the smell, i wish it smelt a little bit better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using for a month now and I really haven't seen a noticeable difference other then my skin peeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall this product was really good! As someone who has very sensitive skin, this was gentle and only gave me a little bit of redness. I recommend incorporating this into your nightly skincare routine, so your skin is fresh and bright in the morning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample from PinchMe. This product really does work. I have dull skin and this product brightened my skin soo much! I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product, but I’m still not sold on the price tag that comes with it. To be honest, I never used a Vitamin C serum before trying this product. I do feel that my skin is a bit smoother in texture, and a bit more plump, after using this for several weeks. Of all of the Vitamin C brightening products in this line, this one is my favorite.

I received this product as a gift in exchange for a review. Loved this product! I noticed brighter skin after only a few days of use. I've used Vitamin C products in the past and find I can't use it daily and it stings quite a bit. However, this product has been great. Was effective and didn't sting one bit. I would highly recommend this product to anyone wanting to brighten and even their skin tone. The only downside I would say is the cost of the product. If it was more affordable, I would include it into my daily routine going forward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok so I received this product in exchange for my honest opinion. I have been using it as directed for 2 weeks now. I attached a before and after picture making sure I used the same lighting (ring light) in both pictures. Now I do have oily skin and for me the combination of using this product in addition to the Rapid Age Spot and Pigment Lightening Serum, the Vita-C Eyes Dark Circlr Corrector and sunscreen it left my face really feeling greasy but thankfully not enough to cause any break outs. Maybe it's just too many products being used at one time. As far as results go I feel like 2 weeks was enough time to see some results but not it's full potential. As you can see by the scar on the right side of my face down by my lip I had a scar that lightened considerably in just two weeks of use. Its actually barely noticeable now where as before I couldnt even cover it with my foundation. Since I was using 2 serums (Brightening serum and Lightening serum) I cant pin point if one or the other did it or the combination of the two working together. But clearly using this line of products is going to give you some results. As far as scents go I dont have a sensitive nose but there is a slight chemical scent with these products. If you are sensitive to smells I'd suggest going to a store location and checking out the smell in person if you can.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I overall really enjoy this serum! It’s very light and absorbs nicely into my skin. It doesn’t have a strong scent, but I do enjoy the scent it does have. I haven’t noticed a huge change in my skin since starting this serum but I definitely plan to keep using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a chemical peel before from another company and it actually did more damage than good. So I was hesitant to try again but I read the reviews and decided to try it out. I've noticed that this serum has actually made the dark spots I had visibly lighter and has made the bad area from the other chemical peel better. I'm so glad I tried this serum. I highly recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I give this 5 stars ! It completely transformed my skin after using it just a few weeks. My scars and hyper pigmentation has gone down after only using it for a few weeks . My skin feels healthy and glowing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a gift in exchange for a review. I'm new to chemical peel esque products and my skin was iffy about this. It did break me out a little but quickly settled down once it got used to it (I used this about once a week due to my sensitive skin). The smell is very chemically as opposed to the rest of the line which has the classic orange smell. I did notice a brightening quality after using and it has gotten rid of some sun damage next to my nose. The packaging is great too. It works perfectly combining the serum and the vitamin C. I feel the need to not wear makeup, and during this quarantine that's a life saver. Summer's coming up and I feel this will be perfect to show off healthy skin (though be careful, it says to stay out of direct sun or wear sunscreen with this due to the nature of the product)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a gift in exchange for a review. I love how lightweight and non greasy this eye serum is. You must have patience, give it the full two + weeks so notice a difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used 1/2 this bottle before writing this review. I received this product for free, from buzzAgent in order for a review. This is my honest opinion of the product. I like that I can visually see how much product is left in the container. It’s also visually appealing. The product itself has a slight yellow tint to it. Easy to rub or dab onto freshly washed skin. I’ve been using it morning and night for about a month. I really like it. I’ve been wearing less make up and this product helps with my confidence during this time. Scent is light. I would repurchase; however it’s $$.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it!! My skin felt and looked better and brighter after 1 use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was told I was glowing even without makeup! Love how light it is and the soft effect it gives me face. Very pleased

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently started back doing chemical peels. I used this after my healing. I like the ease of the pump. The product is very light and easy to apply. It is a very faint shimmer which I guess Is supposed to help with the brightening. It was hard to tell if this really works because I am Regularly doing chemical peels. I will say it leaves my skin feeling nice. For how much this costs, not worth it in my opinion.   Maybe not a product for brown skin girls(?) I received this product complimentary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this vitamin c glycolic brightening serum by Murad!  My skin not only feels healthier, but it also looks radiant and glowing!  After a few weeks of use, my skin tone has become more even and less blotchy. I've seen a huge reduction in the redness of my skin.  It looks smoother and feels soft.  I would definitely recommend this product as part of your everyday skin regimen!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for a review. This serum is ok. Nothing special. I haven't noticed much of a difference to my skin. It is very lightweight, not a strong scent, and not greasy. It absorbs nicely into my skin. It just didn't do much for me besides moisturize.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It worked pretty good but after a few days, I started getting pimples that were knots containing clear liquid. I do have sensitive skin though, so I don't blame the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product seemed to slowly but surely lighten my skin. I noticed dark spots that were pretty stubborn before are actually fading away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Vitamin C Brightening Serum from BzzAgent to try out. I did notice a small difference in my skin complexion. The formula is lightweight and does not feel sticky and no white residue which is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item from the BzzAgent Campaign and am so grateful that I was given the opportunity to try out this amazing new product from Murad; I tried this product out for a few weeks before I decided to write this review so that I could give an honest and accurate review. This serum made  my face super soft after applying it, but I did not notice that much improvement in my stubborn dark spots. This product also has a very distinctive smell that I can't say I love. It smells very chemical-y, which I was surprised about since most vitamin C products smell like oranges to me, but those are probably artificial additives. Overall, I give this product 4 stars because although it did not fade all my dark spots, it did give my skin a slight glow and made it softer after application. Also to note, this is a two part serum (comes in two tubes within the actual bottle), and one part of the serum has shimmer in it; not enough to be obnoxious, but enough to notice a slight glow to your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Overall I am pretty happy with the effects of this serum. It is lightweight and easily absorbed. I have somewhat sensitive skin, and it did burn while applying some days. Fortunately, this didn’t last for more than a couple of seconds. The results are overall positive and I have noticed my skin appears to glow more than it did before using. I would recommend this product!

reviews.review_title: Good but nothing to wow over
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for a few weeks now and I’ve noticed a slight difference in the brightness of my skin. Over the winter months my skin tends to get dull and this product brought a bit of life back to it. The smell goes on lemony/orange but I noticed once it fades it has more of a chemically scent. Could just be me though. The product itself goes on super smoothly and a little goes a long way. It’s pricey but you truly don’t need a lot of it to see a difference. Not sure if I would purchase this product once it runs out.

reviews.review_title: Not my favourite but a decent product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from BzzAgent for testing purposes. I liked this brightening serum but I didn’t see a significant difference in my skin after using for two weeks. It goes on nice and smooth and you don’t need much product, but I found it quite strong and might be irritating if you have sensitive skin. I liked this product fine but given the price and the lack of a noticeable difference in my skin I do not find it comparable to other serums I use. I would not likely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never used a brightening serum before so I was excited to receive this as a sample to try. This product has a really nice smell and consistency. You don’t need a lot and I don’t even need to use moisturizer after applying. I usually get dry skin on my nose and chin during the winter and this helped so much! My skin is looking brighter and has a natural glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 32 year old man, and I have dark circles under my eyes. THERE! I said it! Okay, now that I've gotten that out of the way, I used this product to get rid of my dark circles, aka my Raccoon Eyes, and it works! Sadly, I didn't take any before and after photos, but to my eyes, the area is definitely brightened.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and I absolutely love it. My skin feels so amazing and looks so much brighter. I will continue to use this in my everyday skin routine. I also really love the smell of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not only has this helped brighten my skin but also has made it a lot smoother. If you are a scent type of person, this is not very pleasant but its totally worth it. I would absolutely recommend this if you have dark spots from sun or aging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this serum. It wasn’t thick or sticky and it absorbed quickly. Great for mornings when I don’t have Time to let it set. My skin definitely looks brighter and I can’t wait to see full results after I’ve been using it for a month

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin, and this serum has worked well for me so far. I've noticed an improvement in my skin's brightness and uneven texture caused by hyperpigmentation. The lightweight formula absorbs more quickly than other serums I've tried in the past. I would definitely recommend this serum for anyone looking to smooth out texture and add a dose of vitamin C and glycolic acid to their skincare routine.

I used it for a month, twice daily and I definitely see a difference. My skin has less texture and looks brighter.  This is comparable to the ole henrisken vitamin C serum, but with a better consistency!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good daytime serum! I didn't like it as a nighttime serum, because it's got a shimmery glow to it which is what I want for daytime. It sinks into your skin nicely and gives you a nice glow without being greasy. If your looking for something to give your skin a nice glow then I recommend this serum. I took a star away, because I think it's way to expensive for the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After a month my skin was glowing but I wouldn't say it was significantly brighter. I do take good care of my skin so it's usually always glowing but it was more prominent after incorporating this product into my skin care routine. Also, I didn't notice a smell so overall I liked it but I haven't noticed a drastic difference as of yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum makes my skin feel so silky smooth! It’s light weight and absorbs quickly. It is not greasy. I just love the way it makes my skin glow and look brighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this product along with the Vita-C Dark Circle Color Corrector and the Rapid Age Spot and Pigment Lightening Serum. I tend to have dull spots on my face and I have tried numerous products to achieve a brightened, toned complexion. I have used this product religiously for a month and have seen a brightening in my skin. I have used other skin toning and brightening products in the past, but haven’t seen a visible result. I believe my skin will only become more toned as I continue to use these products in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I seriously love this product. I used to put a conglomeration of lotion/foundation/etc on my face in the morning or whenever I’d wash my face just to try to cover the redness/dryness as best I could. After getting this brightening serum HOLY COW there’s no going back. It goes on SO smooth and it really does brighten your face up and makeup goes on so evenly over it! I seriously love this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this to test and write a review! I incorporated it into my regular skin routine and I love it. It’s light and I love it...I can say that after almost a month of use you can definitely see a difference

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using it for almost a month I have definitely noticed a bit of a difference, skin looked now glowy and less texturized. I usually apply it in the morning, after my toner and before my moisturizer.. and then proceed with my makeup. I do not like the smell of most vitamin C products, but this one has a good scent that goes away quickly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It brightens more then the sun! No seriously i gave This product to my mother who is 58 years old and a recovering addict. Her skin was not the best at the time. Once she started using this with the other products it was as if her face started back over. It’s cleared up and her scars are gone.   It’s as if she is back in her early 30’s starting to take care of her face again. This serum in itself has brightened under her eyes so much. I cant Say enough about Murad products. These products really work and help!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love Murad! Their products never disappoint. This one made my skin so much brighter and glowy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this item to test and I have been using it for a month straight. I incorporated it into my regular skin routine and I love it. I can clearly see a change in the brightness of my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product free for my honest review. After using this product for several weeks I did not notice a difference at first. I did notice a slight sting and a strong smell when applying. I do not think it has helped my skin marks but my texture has now suddenly improved. I have a natural glow and my skin is much smoother. I really enjoy this product and would definitely purchase for myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this so much! I can see a difference after a week of use! It's gorgeous coming out of the bottle, and it feels nice and luxe on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product!!  I noticed my overall complexion was brightening after about two weeks of use.  I didn't notice too much lightening in any dark spots I have, but I didn't expect to.  Would definitely buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for an unbiased review from BzzAgent. This product is something you have to use consistently or you won’t see results- and results aren’t instant. I noticed after a few weeks of using nightly a difference in my skin. I’m really impressed with how it made my skin have a healthy looking glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! It has helped brighten my full complexion and  even out my skin tone. I use it every day under my moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this serum. I'm more of a natural look girl and this serum instantly brightens your skin. I incorporated it into my morning routine and I love it. Sometimes I just wear that for a glowy look. It's super light and non greasy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Murad Vitamin C Glycolic Brightening Serum free to try for my unbiased review and I’m grateful I did! After using it consistently for two weeks, I’ve noticed my skin looking brighter and with a glow. It goes on smoothly with a nice scent. There isn’t a heavy weight to it at all. I would recommend giving this a try if you are looking for brighter skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I applied this amazing serum I could see my face so much brighter after just one use. Absolutely loving this and the results.  It’s super light on my skin and it feels like nothing is there. I use this twice a day! If you’re looking for a great face serum this is it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum! I received it free for an unbiased review. This serum is amazing. The smell is great too. It’s not overpowering, but very good. It takes a while to notice the effects, but I promise it works. I’ll definitely keep using it later!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Texture is nice, smell is great but I didn't really notice a difference. The pricepoint doesn't make sense, though the product feels and smells nice.

reviews.review_title: Takes a while to notice a difference..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like other reviews have said, this product does take a while to seem like it’s working.. I used it for several weeks without seeing many differences, or any at all. Until one day, I could see my skin glowing a bit more than usual, without makeup on. It definitely helped my confidence quite a bit! I received this product complimentary for my honest and unbiased review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s hard to notice the difference at first. You have to be using consistently for at least 2 Weeks. After that period you will notice the natural skin glow improving significantly and the skin tone being more even. I received this complimentary to test out and I recommend it. Use it at night and use a moisturizer after. The use of spf or sunblock is advised as it can make your skin more sensitive and you should avoid exposure to sunlight as much as possible

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary bottle to try out and review. I used it for several weeks. At first, I didn’t notice any differences, but after 2 weeks I noticed that my skin looked brighter and was naturally glowing. It did make my skin extra sensitive, especially to light, so I put mine on at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this product, I can feel a smoother skin with a healthier look. When I started using it, I had a couple of pimples and now they are gone. The package is nice and the product even better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have never really used anything like this before so I was pleasantly surprised with the results. It has definitely made my skin more clear and bright. I have actually had fewer breakouts as well since I started using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary for testing purposes. I’ve used a lot of glycolic’s high and low end. This one is for sure one of my top 5 brightening serums. I use this strictly in my night time routine and I’ve been using it for about 3 weeks now and notice my skin is brighter, smoother and my skin tone is more even. I would advise using a sun screen every morning as these types of products can make you sensitive to sunlight. The product packaging is very user friendly.  Serum tip - a lot of people don’t know that you should pat your serum into your skin. Then apply your moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Murad Brightening Serum for a few weeks now and it was so good to use. I put it on my face and neck every night before bed. The product itself feels like a thinner moisturizer and absorbs into the skin after just a few seconds. I have used so many serums that left my skin feeling extremely sticky or it felt like I had product on my face. The Murad Serum leaves no sticky residue on my face and once absorbed you cannot tell its on your skin by feeling it. My face feels fresh, soft and hydrated. After using it for a few weeks I thought my skin looked much better than before. It looked brighter and I thought that some of the discoloration I had before was gone or at least much less noticeable. There is a great amount of product in the bottle as well and because you do not have to use a lot to cover large areas, it will last you a long time. I will definitely be continuing to use it and repurchase it after this bottle is gone.

reviews.review_title: Vita-C Glycolic Brightening Serum does wonders!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the serum for about a month now and can definitely see a difference in my skin's appearance—it's so much brighter, smoother, and softer! The serum is lightweight and a little goes a long way. I’m not even halfway through the bottle yet so it should definitely last a few months and is worth every penny.  I have sensitive skin and it did not irritate it all. I’m loving how my skin now has a natural glow/radiance!!! 1000% recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks to Bzzagent, I received this product complimentary, in exchange for my honest review. My skin seems to soak this serum right up like it knows exactly how healthy vitamin C is. I actually really like it. I have noticed significant difference in the brightening of my skin and upper chest, I have also used it on just to keep a color match. ..I can't wait to continue to see results as I keep using this serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I always love a good moisturizer loaded with vitamin c and this did not disappoint.  While I don't love how quickly it dries into the skin (without leaving skin feeling very soft), I do think that it does brighten, while also working slowly on fine lines. I think it is better suited for someone with oily skin.  There is no overwhelming scent, which is always a plus for me.  I  received this product for review purposes.

reviews.review_title: Great addition to my Skin Care Routine!
reviews.review_text: I had never tried a brightening serum before but decided to incorporate one into my skincare routine. The smell of this serum is very citrusy and is really lovely. My skin always looks much better in the morning as it evens out my redness. Only issue is that this serum is a little sticky so I would wait a few minutes before lying down on a pillow or anything! Feels great under makeup too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The dark spots on my checks and chin look a lot lighter after using it regularly for 3 weeks. Very effective

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works so well! You do not need a lot of product for your face so this bottle should last  a while. after about a week my skin was so much brighter and tighter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am an EMT who works mostly overnights. A lot of times I get up during the wee hours of the mornings for calls and my face is dull and splotchy. Using this product actually decreased the redness of my face during the day and night. I love how light and absorbent the serum is and it felt like water on my skin. This product legitimately brightened my skin over the span of 2 weeks and helped smooth out that splotchy just woke up look.   My mom also tried this product.  She has oilier skin and also struggles with dull skin. She loved how absorbent the formula was and found her skin didn't feel sticky after use. Both of us loved the citrusy smell of the serum and it definitely made our faces feel plumper and fresher. The cost is steep but if money wasn't an issue I would definitely give this five stars. I did receive this sample as a BzzAgent, but it didn't influence the overwhelmingly positive results of this product. I loved how this product solved my splotchy bed face in two weeks and I would definitely buy it again if it was cheaper.

reviews.review_title: Evens out skin tone very nicely!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for almost a month and very impressed.  I started seeing results about a week and a half into using it once a day.  Then after about 4 weeks I could really tell my skin looked brighter and more even.  I have a few sun spots and hyperpigmentation.  This serum really helped even out my skin tone so much to where I stopped wearing a full coverage foundation and have switched to a more tinted moisturizer.   I use this once a day at night before my moisturizer.  It only take a very little, so the bottle with last a long time!   Overall, I’m very pleased with how this evens my skin tone and gives my skin more of a glow from the inside!

reviews.review_title: It's lightened the redness of my skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lately, my skin has been very dull, so I’ve been trying to the Vitamin C Glycolic Brightening Serum. My cheeks are typically really red and it’s quite annoying, but I’ve found that with consistent use of this product, it’s lightened the redness of my skin. Was quite surprised by that. It’s a great formula that is easy to apply. It’s lightweight, which is great since I have oily skin and heavier formulas are too heavy for my skin. Obviously, it has Vitamin-C in it, which is PERFECT for what’s going on in the world right now. The Vitamin C Glycolic Brightening Serum is a product that I would continue to use. However, it is quite expensive, so I'm not sure if it's a product that I would be able to purchase again. Though you only need to use a little bit of it, so I feel like it would last a really long time.  I did receive Vitamin C Glycolic Brightening Serum through BzzAgent in exchange for my honest opinion. Despite that, my thoughts weren’t influenced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product through Bzzzagent to try and review. For reference, my complexion is very fair and 90% of the time it is clear of blemishes. I wouldn’t say that I was unhappy with my skin prior to this product, but with being so pale something that is supposed to give a “glow” to the skin interests me. Here is my take on the product:  Positives: Skin looks more radiant and when first applied definitely has a glowy sheen (not sparkly, but almost appears to reflect light) Makes skin look and feel plump  Doesn’t leave a sticky feeling  Leaves your skin feeling really soft Didn’t irritate my sensitive skin   Negatives: Has a tingly sensation when applied to the skin Can make skin feel dry if you don’t moisturize after High price tag  Overall I am happy with this product, I think the high price tag would have made me hesitate to buy the product, but I will continue to use this product and if I continue to see these results I would purchase it again!!!

reviews.review_text: I have consistently been using this product for about a month — it definitely has helped my skin appear brighter and reduce the texture I have in my tzone. My skin looks more radiant and smooth! What I love about this product is that it does not make my skin sensitive. I have used products like this in the past that have tore up my skin. It was just too harsh, but this is definitely a more gentle glycolic acid. I feel like this formula will work for most people. Definitely pair it with a sunscreen! I picked up the Murad Environmental Shield Essential-C Day Moisture with SPF to use while trying this out and it complimented it well! I live in sunny FL and I have not had issues with my face burning. I love that the formula is not greasy, absorbs fast, and does not break me out. The packaging is esthetically pleasing! My only complaint is the pump. If it is not completely flat when you are pressing it, the product distribution is slightly off. It’s not something that would keep from purchasing this product. I definitely recommend this serum if you are looking for a product that helps with the smoothness and overall radiance of your skin!  (Transparency: I received this product as a gift from BzzAgent but all thoughts and opinions are my own)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, has really improved my skins appearance and texture!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a little over 3 weeks. I have been seeing some amazing results. The first week my face took a bit of getting used to the product so I had somewhat of a breakout but after that I was golden :).. My face has appeared more brighter, my breakouts have been minimized & my hyperpigmentation has defiantly faded. I like the scent a bit citrusy & the consistency is thick. I will attach 2 pictures of my results (the picture with the Orange top is before & the black top is after). I got this product complimentary for testing purposes.. I can’t wait see how it will looks after 6 weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried multiple products of all diffrent price ranges, but this one is so far my favorite. I've purchased Murad products before in the past and this one does NOT disappoint. I've been using the brightening serum a little over 2 weeks now and I must admit it i see a diffrence. My face doesent look as dull. It looks brighter, clear and overall healthier. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has made my skin so much brighter! It doesn't have a a smell and goes on really well. I would say its worth a try, it is quite expensive but the bottle is big.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This murad brightening serum is a must have! I have been using nightly for two weeks now and my skin is absolutely glowing and gorgeous. I love how this product leaves my skin with a natural glow. Highly recommended product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I found that this was a strong, effective brightening cream. It has no offensive scent. The texture is light and it did not make my combination skin feel oily or greasy. I primarily use this cream as a part of my evening skincare routine in combination with the matching eye cream. The only reason I decided to rate down to 4 stars from 5 is that it broke me out when I first began using this cream. I don’t get many breakouts and hardly ever on my cheeks. This was the only new product that I had introduced. However, my skin did get used to the product and it eventually stopped. I just wish it didn’t have to go through that process. My first bottle is going well so far; you don’t need much at a time. I received this for free in exchange for my honest feedback.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product free and was not a fan. The scent is wonderful but the product made me breakout. I don’t have sensitive skin so this was unusual for me. May work well for someone else. I didn’t find it made my skin brighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using any kind of Brightening Serum. It is definitely one of those things I didn’t realize how much I needed it until I started using. The texture and color of my face are indeed brighter and I’m diggin not wearing makeup right now. My only complaint is the scent of this product is not my favorite but I’ll take the scent in exchange for the beautiful results it gives!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like it! After using it for about 3 weeks or so it actually has brightened the dark spots on my face. I like the feel of it on my face. It’s not thick or oily. It just feels fresh and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING! Love this suite of products! I have been using the brightening serum along with 2 other products for the past several weeks and I see a major improvement in my skin's overall appearance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for a few weeks ago and I like it along with many other of Murad's products. I've been using it in the mornings along with their Vita-C Dark Circle Color Corrector and I really see the glow after I use it.  I'll be interested to see how my skin continues to brighten as I keep using this product.  I even use it after my spot acne treatment in the morning and I did not have any harmful reactions to using this.  It is a very light product to use and is perfect to use under make up as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m loving this product. I definitely feel like my skin looks brighter after regular use of this product. The red spots all around my face have started to fade and I haven’t been breaking out nearly as bad as I was before using this product. Using this with the entire brightening system by Murad has absolutely benefited my skin.
